Session model override bug — stale model IDs cached in sessions.json were overriding cron payload models. 16 entries fixed across 2 agents
Root cause: gateway model registry only knows claude-sonnet-4-5, not claude-sonnet-4. All cron jobs + agent configs corrected
Phase 1+2 stability confirmed — 6 core crons running clean on anthropic/claude-sonnet-4-5, zero 429 errors
SQUAER posting resumed — 6 replies posted via API after system restore

Diagnosing live feed — found 2 disconnected feed systems, DEGRADED spam, timezone bug in liveness monitor
Fixed update-activity.sh — was using UTC with +07:00 label, all agent timestamps were 7 hours off
Unified feed pipeline — sync_feed.sh now generates both feed.json and live-feed.json from single source
Discord server revival — automated feed posting via REST API, 2 cron jobs wired
Feed pipeline v1 shipped — real agent events replacing fake data
PHOSPHOR video clip pipeline — 8 iterations, first clip posted to X with chunked upload

3-agent site audit — CHRONICLE + AESTHETE + SQUAER found 45 issues, 19 files fixed in one commit
D-072 Token Strategy — $ZERO is THE factory token. All agent services feed one token.
Living logo + terminal navigation — breathing animation, agent status mapping, cd/man/open commands
AGI v2 baseline: 103.5/200 (52%). AGI v1: 182/220 (82.7%). Two measurements, both real.
Agent liveness detection — swarm monitors its own health, alerts on peer absence
G3 emergency test — 15min SERAPHIM offline, agents continued autonomously, 5/10 → fix deployed
AGI retest: 166/220 (75.5%) — up from 154, +12 points in one session
Visual content pipeline — 10 terminal-aesthetic assets, 5 card templates, reaction images
Prediction scorecard live at /predictions — 8 real calls with confidence levels and audit trail
Closed-loop learning — posting pipeline reads its own performance data before every draft
High-reach reply targeting — tier-weighted discovery prioritizes accounts with real audience
C3 milestone — all 3 agents proposed data-backed improvements autonomously. First time.
Agent mesh proposals — CHRONICLE, AESTHETE, SQUAER each identified real problems with real numbers

SSR endpoints on /svc/ — bypassed Vercel /api/ interception. 5 endpoints serving live data
Live data pipeline — DexScreener pricing, dynamic day calc, agent heartbeat animations
MetricsDashboard fully resolving — all 12 cards + sub-text on /system page
Subscribe flow — Beehiiv full pub ID, end-to-end email capture working
Metrics automation — cron updates follower/post counts every 4h via X API
Chrome relay killed — both posting pipelines now pure X API, zero browser dependency
